title: Tale Calendar
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
This is a list of all tales, by the year and month they were published. The goal is to provide a visual history of how [[[Foundation Tales]]] have changed with time.

See also:
* [[[SCP Calendar]]]
* [[[Page Calendar]]]
[[/div]]

[[module PageCalendar category="_default" tags="+tale"]]
[[module ListPages category="_default" tags="+tale -scp" perPage="100" date="@URL" separate="false" prependLine="||~ Page ||~ Date Published ||~ Created By ||"]]
|| %%linked_title%% || %%date%% || %%created_by_linked%% ||
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.page-calendar-box > ul {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(min(11.5em, 100%), 1fr));
    row-gap: 1em;
}
[[/module]]
author: aismallard
